ygData.subject: Re: Disenchantment.
ygData.msgSnippet: Fun Bob wrote:  I think one of the main problems at the moment with our songs is the fact that resistances are broken. (Or so I ve been lead to
ygData.messageBody:
Fun Bob wrote:
<snip>

I think one of the main problems at the moment with our songs is
the fact that 'resistances' are broken. (Or so I've been lead to
believe).
So, what good is Elemental Rhythms and Purifying Rhythms if they
do nothing to help you combat spellcasters or undeads or the like?

As I mentioned in an earlier post, my level 13 bard plays 3 songs
out of the 13 available: Anthem, Bellow and Heal.
The occasionally Accelerando or Locating Lyric not withstanding.

Maybe the higher level songs will add some variety, but from what
I have seen of spell listings, the most useful ones seem to just
be upgrades of lower level songs.

Hence my bard is also on vacation.

Rocket
